verses.verse: וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> these הַמִּשְׁפָּטִ֔ים <S%H4941><s%> Now these [are] the judgments אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which תָּשִׂ֖ים <S%H7760><s%> which thou shalt set לִפְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H6440><s%> before

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> If תִקְנֶה֙ <S%H7069><s%> If thou buy עֶ֣בֶד <S%H5650><s%> servant עִבְרִ֔י <S%H5680><s%> an Hebrew שֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H8337><s%> six שָׁנִ֖ים <S%H8141><s%> years יַעֲבֹ֑ד <S%H5647><s%> he shall serve וּבַ֨שְּׁבִעִ֔ת <S%H7637><s%> and in the seventh יֵצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> he shall go out לַֽחָפְשִׁ֖י <S%H2670><s%> free חִנָּֽם׃ <S%H2600><s%> for nothing

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If בְּגַפּ֥וֹ <S%H1610><s%> by himself יָבֹ֖א <S%H935><s%> If he came in בְּגַפּ֣וֹ <S%H1610><s%> by himself יֵצֵ֑א <S%H3318><s%> he shall go out אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if בַּ֤עַל <S%H1167><s%> is the husband אִשָּׁה֙ <S%H802><s%> then his wife ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וְיָצְאָ֥ה <S%H3318><s%> shall go out אִשְׁתּ֖וֹ <S%H802><s%> his wife עִמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5973><s%> with

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If אֲדֹנָיו֙ <S%H113><s%> If his master יִתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> have given ל֣וֹ אִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H802><s%> him a wife וְיָלְדָה־ <S%H3205><s%> and she have born ל֥וֹ בָנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> him sons א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> or בָנ֑וֹת <S%H1323><s%> or daughters הָאִשָּׁ֣ה <S%H802><s%> the wife וִילָדֶ֗יהָ <S%H3206><s%> and her children תִּהְיֶה֙ <S%H1961><s%> shall belong לַֽאדֹנֶ֔יהָ <S%H113><s%> shall be her master's וְה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> and he יֵצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> and he shall go out בְגַפּֽוֹ׃ <S%H1610><s%> by himself

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if אָמֹ֤ר <S%H559><s%> shall plainly יֹאמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> say הָעֶ֔בֶד <S%H5650><s%> And if the servant אָהַ֙בְתִּי֙ <S%H157><s%> I love אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲדֹנִ֔י <S%H113><s%> my master אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אִשְׁתִּ֖י <S%H802><s%> my wife וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּנָ֑י <S%H1121><s%> and my children לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> I will not אֵצֵ֖א <S%H3318><s%> I will not go out חָפְשִֽׁי׃ <S%H2670><s%> free

וְהִגִּישׁ֤וֹ <S%H5066><s%> shall bring אֲדֹנָיו֙ <S%H113><s%> Then his master אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָ֣אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> him unto the judges וְהִגִּישׁוֹ֙ <S%H5066><s%> he shall also bring אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַדֶּ֔לֶת <S%H1817><s%> him to the door א֖וֹ <S%H176><s%> or אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַמְּזוּזָ֑ה <S%H4201><s%> or unto the door post וְרָצַ֨ע <S%H7527><s%> shall bore אֲדֹנָ֤יו <S%H113><s%> and his master אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָזְנוֹ֙ <S%H241><s%> his ear בַּמַּרְצֵ֔עַ <S%H4836><s%> through with an aul וַעֲבָד֖וֹ <S%H5647><s%> and he shall serve לְעֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> him for ever ס

וְכִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> If יִמְכֹּ֥ר <S%H4376><s%> sell אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And if a man אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בִּתּ֖וֹ <S%H1323><s%> his daughter לְאָמָ֑ה <S%H519><s%> to be a maidservant לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> is not תֵצֵ֖א <S%H3318><s%> she shall not go out כְּצֵ֥את <S%H3318><s%> do הָעֲבָדִֽים׃ <S%H5650><s%> as the menservants

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If רָעָ֞ה <S%H7451><s%> is displeasing בְּעֵינֵ֧י <S%H5869><s%> the eyes אֲדֹנֶ֛יהָ <S%H113><s%> not her master אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who [לֹא כ] (לֹ֥ו <S%H3808><s%> not ק) יְעָדָ֖הּ <S%H3259><s%> who hath betrothed וְהֶפְדָּ֑הּ <S%H6299><s%> her to himself then shall he let her be redeemed לְעַ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> nation נָכְרִ֛י <S%H5237><s%> her unto a strange לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> does not יִמְשֹׁ֥ל <S%H4910><s%> he shall have no power לְמָכְרָ֖הּ <S%H4376><s%> to sell בְּבִגְדוֹ־ <S%H898><s%> seeing he hath dealt deceitfully בָֽהּ׃

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> If לִבְנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> her unto his son יִֽיעָדֶ֑נָּה <S%H3259><s%> And if he have betrothed כְּמִשְׁפַּ֥ט <S%H4941><s%> with her after the manner הַבָּנ֖וֹת <S%H1323><s%> of daughters יַעֲשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> he shall deal לָּֽהּ׃

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If אַחֶ֖רֶת <S%H312><s%> him another יִֽקַּֽח־ <S%H3947><s%> If he take ל֑וֹ שְׁאֵרָ֛הּ <S%H7607><s%> [wife] her food כְּסוּתָ֥הּ <S%H3682><s%> her raiment וְעֹנָתָ֖הּ <S%H5772><s%> and her duty of marriage לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> may not יִגְרָֽע׃ <S%H1639><s%> shall he not diminish

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> If שְׁלָ֨שׁ־ <S%H7969><s%> not these three אֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> he will not יַעֲשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> And if he do לָ֑הּ וְיָצְאָ֥ה <S%H3318><s%> unto her then shall she go out חִנָּ֖ם <S%H2600><s%> free אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> without כָּֽסֶף׃ <S%H3701><s%> without money ס
מַכֵּ֥ה <S%H5221><s%> He that smiteth אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> a man וָמֵ֖ת <S%H4191><s%> so that he die מ֥וֹת <S%H4191><s%> shall be surely יוּמָֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> put to death

וַאֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> if לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> did not צָדָ֔ה <S%H6658><s%> And if a man lie not in wait וְהָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> but God אִנָּ֣ה <S%H579><s%> deliver לְיָד֑וֹ <S%H3027><s%> [him] into his hand וְשַׂמְתִּ֤י <S%H7760><s%> then I will appoint לְךָ֙ מָק֔וֹם <S%H4725><s%> thee a place אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> to which יָנ֖וּס <S%H5127><s%> whither he shall flee שָֽׁמָּה׃ <S%H8033><s%> in it ס

וְכִי־ <S%H3588><s%> If יָזִ֥ד <S%H2102><s%> come presumptuously אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> But if a man עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> toward רֵעֵ֖הוּ <S%H7453><s%> upon his neighbour לְהָרְג֣וֹ <S%H2026><s%> to slay בְעָרְמָ֑ה <S%H6195><s%> him with guile מֵעִ֣ם <S%H5973><s%> him from מִזְבְּחִ֔י <S%H4196><s%> him from mine altar תִּקָּחֶ֖נּוּ <S%H3947><s%> thou shalt take לָמֽוּת׃ <S%H4191><s%> that he may die ס
וּמַכֵּ֥ה <S%H5221><s%> And he that smiteth אָבִ֛יו <S%H1><s%> his father וְאִמּ֖וֹ <S%H517><s%> or his mother מ֥וֹת <S%H4191><s%> shall be surely יוּמָֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> put to death

וְגֹנֵ֨ב <S%H1589><s%> And he that stealeth אִ֧ישׁ <S%H376><s%> a man וּמְכָר֛וֹ <S%H4376><s%> and selleth וְנִמְצָ֥א <S%H4672><s%> him or if he be found בְיָד֖וֹ <S%H3027><s%> in his hand מ֥וֹת <S%H4191><s%> he shall surely יוּמָֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> be put to death ס
וּמְקַלֵּ֥ל <S%H7043><s%> And he that curseth אָבִ֛יו <S%H1><s%> his father וְאִמּ֖וֹ <S%H517><s%> or his mother מ֥וֹת <S%H4191><s%> shall surely יוּמָֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> be put to death ס

וְכִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> If יְרִיבֻ֣ן <S%H7378><s%> strive אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H376><s%> together and one וְהִכָּה־ <S%H5221><s%> smite אִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> and one אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רֵעֵ֔הוּ <S%H7453><s%> another בְּאֶ֖בֶן <S%H68><s%> with a stone א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> or בְאֶגְרֹ֑ף <S%H106><s%> with [his] fist וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> does not יָמ֖וּת <S%H4191><s%> and he die וְנָפַ֥ל <S%H5307><s%> not but keepeth לְמִשְׁכָּֽב׃ <S%H4904><s%> [his] bed

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if יָק֞וּם <S%H6965><s%> If he rise again וְהִתְהַלֵּ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> and walk בַּח֛וּץ <S%H2351><s%> abroad עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on מִשְׁעַנְתּ֖וֹ <S%H4938><s%> upon his staff וְנִקָּ֣ה <S%H5352><s%> [him] be quit הַמַּכֶּ֑ה <S%H5221><s%> then shall he that smote רַ֥ק <S%H7535><s%> but שִׁבְתּ֛וֹ <S%H7674><s%> [for] the loss of his time יִתֵּ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> only he shall pay וְרַפֹּ֥א <S%H7495><s%> and shall cause [him] to be thoroughly יְרַפֵּֽא׃ <S%H7495><s%> healed ס

וְכִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> If יַכֶּה֩ <S%H5221><s%> smite אִ֨ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And if a man אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַבְדּ֜וֹ <S%H5650><s%> his servant א֤וֹ <S%H176><s%> or אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲמָתוֹ֙ <S%H519><s%> or his maid בַּשֵּׁ֔בֶט <S%H7626><s%> with a rod וּמֵ֖ת <S%H4191><s%> and he die תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> Thahash יָד֑וֹ <S%H3027><s%> under his hand נָקֹ֖ם <S%H5358><s%> he shall be surely יִנָּקֵֽם׃ <S%H5358><s%> punished

אַ֥ךְ <S%H389><s%> Notwithstanding אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If י֛וֹם <S%H3117><s%> a day א֥וֹ <S%H176><s%> or יוֹמַ֖יִם <S%H3117><s%> A day יַעֲמֹ֑ד <S%H5975><s%> if he continue לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no יֻקַּ֔ם <S%H5358><s%> he shall not be punished כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for כַסְפּ֖וֹ <S%H3701><s%> for he [is] his money הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he ס

וְכִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> If יִנָּצ֣וּ <S%H5327><s%> strive אֲנָשִׁ֗ים <S%H582><s%> If men וְנָ֨גְפ֜וּ <S%H5062><s%> and hurt אִשָּׁ֤ה <S%H802><s%> a woman הָרָה֙ <S%H2030><s%> with child וְיָצְא֣וּ <S%H3318><s%> depart יְלָדֶ֔יהָ <S%H3206><s%> so that her fruit וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> is no יִהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> become אָס֑וֹן <S%H611><s%> [from her] and yet no mischief follow עָנ֣וֹשׁ <S%H6064><s%> he shall be surely יֵעָנֵ֗שׁ <S%H6064><s%> punished כַּֽאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after יָשִׁ֤ית <S%H7896><s%> will lay עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> and בַּ֣עַל <S%H1167><s%> husband הָֽאִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H802><s%> according as the woman's וְנָתַ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> upon him and he shall pay בִּפְלִלִֽים׃ <S%H6414><s%> as the judges

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if אָס֖וֹן <S%H611><s%> And if [any] mischief follow יִהְיֶ֑ה <S%H1961><s%> become וְנָתַתָּ֥ה <S%H5414><s%> then thou shalt give נֶ֖פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> life תַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> Thahash נָֽפֶשׁ׃ <S%H5315><s%> for life

עַ֚יִן <S%H5869><s%> Eye תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> Thahash עַ֔יִן <S%H5869><s%> for eye שֵׁ֖ן <S%H8127><s%> tooth תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> Thahash שֵׁ֑ן <S%H8127><s%> for tooth יָ֚ד <S%H3027><s%> hand תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> Thahash יָ֔ד <S%H3027><s%> for hand רֶ֖גֶל <S%H7272><s%> foot תַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> Thahash רָֽגֶל׃ <S%H7272><s%> for foot

כְּוִיָּה֙ <S%H3555><s%> Burning תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> Thahash כְּוִיָּ֔ה <S%H3555><s%> for burning פֶּ֖צַע <S%H6482><s%> wound תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> Thahash פָּ֑צַע <S%H6482><s%> for wound חַבּוּרָ֕ה <S%H2250><s%> stripe תַּ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> Thahash חַבּוּרָֽה׃ <S%H2250><s%> for stripe ס

וְכִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> If יַכֶּ֨ה <S%H5221><s%> smite אִ֜ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And if a man אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֵ֥ין <S%H5869><s%> the eye עַבְדּ֛וֹ <S%H5650><s%> of his servant אֽוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֵ֥ין <S%H5869><s%> or the eye אֲמָת֖וֹ <S%H519><s%> of his maid וְשִֽׁחֲתָ֑הּ <S%H7843><s%> that it perish לַֽחָפְשִׁ֥י <S%H2670><s%> free יְשַׁלְּחֶ֖נּוּ <S%H7971><s%> he shall let him go תַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> for עֵינֽוֹ׃ <S%H5869><s%> his eye's ס

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> and if שֵׁ֥ן <S%H8127><s%> tooth עַבְדּ֛וֹ <S%H5650><s%> out his manservant's אֽוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or שֵׁ֥ן <S%H8127><s%> tooth אֲמָת֖וֹ <S%H519><s%> or his maidservant's יַפִּ֑יל <S%H5307><s%> And if he smite לַֽחָפְשִׁ֥י <S%H2670><s%> free יְשַׁלְּחֶ֖נּוּ <S%H7971><s%> he shall let him go תַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> account שִׁנּֽוֹ׃ <S%H8127><s%> for his tooth's פ

וְכִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> If יִגַּ֨ח <S%H5055><s%> gore שׁ֥וֹר <S%H7794><s%> If an ox אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> a man א֥וֹ <S%H176><s%> or אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> or a woman וָמֵ֑ת <S%H4191><s%> that they die סָק֨וֹל <S%H5619><s%> shall be surely יִסָּקֵ֜ל <S%H5619><s%> stoned הַשּׁ֗וֹר <S%H7794><s%> then the ox וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not יֵאָכֵל֙ <S%H398><s%> shall not be eaten אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּשָׂר֔וֹ <S%H1320><s%> and his flesh וּבַ֥עַל <S%H1167><s%> but the owner הַשּׁ֖וֹר <S%H7794><s%> of the ox נָקִֽי׃ <S%H5355><s%> [shall be] quit

וְאִ֡ם <S%H518><s%> If שׁוֹר֩ <S%H7794><s%> But if the ox נַגָּ֨ח <S%H5056><s%> were wont to push with his horn ה֜וּא <S%H1931><s%> he מִתְּמֹ֣ל <S%H8543><s%> before שִׁלְשֹׁ֗ם <S%H8032><s%> before that time וְהוּעַ֤ד <S%H5749><s%> and it hath been testified בִּבְעָלָיו֙ <S%H1167><s%> to his owner וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> does not יִשְׁמְרֶ֔נּוּ <S%H8104><s%> and he hath not kept וְהֵמִ֥ית <S%H4191><s%> him in but that he hath killed אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> a man א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> or אִשָּׁ֑ה <S%H802><s%> or a woman הַשּׁוֹר֙ <S%H7794><s%> the ox יִסָּקֵ֔ל <S%H5619><s%> shall be stoned וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> also בְּעָלָ֖יו <S%H1167><s%> and his owner יוּמָֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> also shall be put to death

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If כֹּ֖פֶר <S%H3724><s%> on him a sum of money יוּשַׁ֣ת <S%H7896><s%> If there be laid עָלָ֑יו <S%H5921><s%> of וְנָתַן֙ <S%H5414><s%> then he shall give פִּדְיֹ֣ן <S%H6306><s%> for the ransom נַפְשׁ֔וֹ <S%H5315><s%> of his life כְּכֹ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> all manner אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after יוּשַׁ֖ת <S%H7896><s%> whatsoever is laid עָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

אוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or בֵ֥ן <S%H1121><s%> a son יִגָּ֖ח <S%H5055><s%> Whether he have gored אוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or בַ֣ת <S%H1323><s%> a daughter יִגָּ֑ח <S%H5055><s%> have gored כַּמִּשְׁפָּ֥ט <S%H4941><s%> according to this judgment הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> to the same יֵעָ֥שֶׂה <S%H6213><s%> shall it be done לּֽוֹ׃

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If עֶ֛בֶד <S%H5650><s%> a manservant יִגַּ֥ח <S%H5055><s%> shall push הַשּׁ֖וֹר <S%H7794><s%> If the ox א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> or אָמָ֑ה <S%H519><s%> or a maidservant כֶּ֣סֶף ׀ <S%H3701><s%> of silver שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <S%H7970><s%> thirty שְׁקָלִ֗ים <S%H8255><s%> shekels יִתֵּן֙ <S%H5414><s%> he shall give לַֽאדֹנָ֔יו <S%H113><s%> unto their master וְהַשּׁ֖וֹר <S%H7794><s%> and the ox יִסָּקֵֽל׃ <S%H5619><s%> shall be stoned ס

וְכִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> If יִפְתַּ֨ח <S%H6605><s%> shall open אִ֜ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And if a man בּ֗וֹר <S%H953><s%> a pit א֠וֹ <S%H176><s%> or כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> If יִכְרֶ֥ה <S%H3738><s%> shall dig אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> or if a man בֹּ֖ר <S%H953><s%> a pit וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and does not יְכַסֶּ֑נּוּ <S%H3680><s%> and not cover וְנָֽפַל־ <S%H5307><s%> fall שָׁ֥מָּה <S%H8033><s%> over שּׁ֖וֹר <S%H7794><s%> it and an ox א֥וֹ <S%H176><s%> or חֲמֽוֹר׃ <S%H2543><s%> or an ass

בַּ֤עַל <S%H1167><s%> The owner הַבּוֹר֙ <S%H953><s%> of the pit יְשַׁלֵּ֔ם <S%H7999><s%> shall make [it] good כֶּ֖סֶף <S%H3701><s%> money יָשִׁ֣יב <S%H7725><s%> [and] give לִבְעָלָ֑יו <S%H1167><s%> unto the owner וְהַמֵּ֖ת <S%H4191><s%> of them and the dead יִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> shall become לּֽוֹ׃ ס

וְכִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> If יִגֹּ֧ף <S%H5062><s%> hurt שֽׁוֹר־ <S%H7794><s%> ox אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And if one man's אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שׁ֥וֹר <S%H7794><s%> ox רֵעֵ֖הוּ <S%H7453><s%> another's וָמֵ֑ת <S%H4191><s%> that he die וּמָ֨כְר֜וּ <S%H4376><s%> then they shall sell אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשּׁ֤וֹר <S%H7794><s%> ox הַחַי֙ <S%H2416><s%> the live וְחָצ֣וּ <S%H2673><s%> and divide אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כַּסְפּ֔וֹ <S%H3701><s%> the money וְגַ֥ם <S%H1571><s%> and also אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמֵּ֖ת <S%H4191><s%> of it and the dead יֶֽחֱצֽוּן׃ <S%H2673><s%> [ox] also they shall divide

א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> Or נוֹדַ֗ע <S%H3045><s%> Or if it be known כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> that שׁ֣וֹר <S%H7794><s%> that the ox נַגָּ֥ח <S%H5056><s%> hath used to push הוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he מִתְּמ֣וֹל <S%H8543><s%> before שִׁלְשֹׁ֔ם <S%H8032><s%> before that time וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> has not יִשְׁמְרֶ֖נּוּ <S%H8104><s%> hath not kept בְּעָלָ֑יו <S%H1167><s%> and his owner שַׁלֵּ֨ם <S%H7999><s%> him in he shall surely יְשַׁלֵּ֥ם <S%H7999><s%> pay שׁוֹר֙ <S%H7794><s%> ox תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> Thahash הַשּׁ֔וֹר <S%H7794><s%> for ox וְהַמֵּ֖ת <S%H4191><s%> and the dead יִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> shall become לּֽוֹ׃ ס
